content.raw:
Despite only have a minor merge conflict, **this is not safe to merge anymore**.

The code is inconsistent with the way we introduced the `Image` output type and some of the suggested ways mercurial wants to merge this are just wrong \(see lines 38/39 of device\_base\_classes.py\). We also need to check whether this is compatible with remote workers and whether or not the broker introduced in this PR still makes sense in the context of remote workers \(and related infrastructure\).

90% of the code is still good though, which is a pretty good effort give it’s been over 2 years…!!

So I think this PR needs to be recreated once we move to GitHub \(we should leave this PR open so that our archival process doesn’t show it as “declined”\)
